description: Introductory quantum mechanics, atomic and molecular structure, chemical bonding, and microscopic understanding of physical and chemical properties of molecules.
name: PHYSICAL CHEMISTRY I

values.comments:
Students had a great deal of praise for Professor Topp’s well-prepared lectures, willingness to help outside of class, and supplementary materials. Students found the course informative and interesting, but many voiced concerns that the testing expectations were not laid out. Some students also had hoped the class to have a more detailed mathematical element.
Note: Less than 25% of students submitted written evaluations for this class.
